nodes.text: The Koorivar Fusiliers were Koorivar infantry that served the Corporate Alliance under the Confederacy of Independent Systems.

The Koorivar Fusiliers were first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in Rise of the Separatists, a 2019 supplement to Fantasy Flight Games' series of Star Wars Roleplaying products. It was originally created for the Star Wars Legends continuity, first appearing in the HoloNet News article "CIS Shadowfeed Dispatch 15:3:21 Edition," written by Pablo Hidalgo and published in Star Wars Insider 76 in 2004.
